ResearchProjectDef.label: Renn Ponds
ResearchProjectDef.description: The anchient stories of this places speak of renn ponds - mythic, glowing ponds that bring luck and depair alike.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Renn Fibers
ResearchProjectDef.description: The ponds glow more brightly when fed with Renn Fiber. Now we know how to plant and cultivate it.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Domestic Renn Fibers
ResearchProjectDef.description: More nutritious seeds of Renn Fiber will improve the effect of Renn Ponds.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Renn Tanks
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grinding the domestic Renn fiber down into a fine powder increases the absorption of the nutrients in renn tanks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Renn Powder
ResearchProjectDef.description: Grinding the domestic Renn fiber down into a fine powder increases the absorption of the nutrients in renn tanks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Engineered Renn Fibers
ResearchProjectDef.description: By careful genetic engineering we can manage to maximize the nutritious parts of the Renn fiber.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Renn Concentrate
ResearchProjectDef.description: Carefully extracting the chemical components digestible for renn microbes from engineered renn fibers leaves us with a highly potent, thick liquid.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Renn Gate
ResearchProjectDef.description: The microbes responsible for the reality-altering effects in renn tanks are in fact just the this-worldly extensions of outer-dimensional, non-sentient beings. By injecting renn Concentrate directly into the host-dimension of the renn microbes, we will further enhance their effects. Including their effects on the overall mental health of our colonists - but you can't have everything.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Renn Capsules
ResearchProjectDef.description: In order to inject renn concentrate directly into the home-dimension of the renn microbes, we will need a delivery container.
